-e ---

𐀃 Oⁿ : Linear-B Letter “o”

𐀃 ᴴOᵘ house 𓉗 hut 𐀃 ᴴOᵐ home 𐀃 ʷOⁿ wohn < 𓊪𓍢 pansion :

𐀃 ≈ 𓊪𓍢 who wen, wem, von, vom : introductory/prothetic world ‘who, in this manner’ (see also ‘jo-’)

𐀃-𐀅 ʷo-da "with" 𐀃-𐀅 oᵐda "mit" 𒈨 𐀅 me 𐀃-𐀅 oⁿda "and" 𐀃-𐀅 ʰoⁿda 𓎛𓈖𓂝

𐀃-𐀅- 𐁀 oⁿda ˢa₂ "und so" 𐀃-𐀅-𐁀 oⁿ δa-aˢ "and thus" 𐀃-𐀅-𐀃 o' da-o too 𐀃-𐀅-𐀃 oˡ-δa-o also <> alter 𐀃-𐀅-𐀃 oⁿ-da-o also, too <> ander

𐀃-𐀄 o-u 𒀀𒀀 a¬, ohne, without, not 𐀃-𐀄-𐀤 o-u-qe auch-nicht, neither
𐀃-𐀅-𐀃 o-da-o and also, with, too

Some 'n' evidence 𐀃-𐀅 oⁿda "and" 𓎛𓈖𓂝 𐀃-𐀄 oⁿu "ohne" 𓂜𓈖 𐀁𐀃 ˢe.oⁿ εών sein ειμί I am 𐀀 -𐀟-𐀃-𐀳 a-pe-ˢo-te απέοντες absent (apseontes!) 𐀞-𐀁-𐀃-𐀳 pa-ˢe-oⁿte present paʳˢeoⁿte see 𐀁 𐀳-𐀃 teʷoⁿ θεόν devine "god"

𐀃-𐀄-𐀇-𐀈-𐀯 o-u-di-do-si not giving

Some 'g' evidence

in 𐀃-𐀄-𐀬-𐀵 oᵍu-ru-to a guard (𐀃𐀄 ≈ 𒀀𒀀 aqua οὐ a¬ ) 𐀃 O ≈ 𒅇 úᵍ 𒌋 GE₁₄ 𒅆 IGI in 𐀃 O ≈ 𒀝 AK 𒀀𒀝;𐎹𒀝;𒄿𒀝;𒀀𒀀𒀝 ayak; a-ak; ya-ak 𐌰𐌿𐌺 auk auch ye'ek "and" @ Elamite 𐀃 O ≈ 𒌑 U in 𐀃-𐀅 o-da "and, with"

𐀀𐀒𐀵𐀜 a-ko-to-no άκτοινος without ‘ktoina’

𐀃-𐀅 oⁿ-da and आणि āṇi "with" 𐀃-𐀅 o-da "with" ( vs 𐀃-𐀄 ohne )
𐀃 O ⇔ 𐘮 WA wohn
𐀃 O ⇔ 𓉔 HO house 𔔙 𐙐 𔔚 𔔛 𔔜 𔔝 𐂬 𐘮 #domus / hut
𐀃 O ⇔ 𒂊 E < 𒂍 É < 𐎅 ḫe, e < et &
𐀃-𐀅 o-da "et" &

𐀃-𐀅-𐁌-𐀲 o-da-twe-ta with tooth
𐀃-𐀅-𐀐-𐀸-𐀲 o-da-ke-we-ta •adjective describing wheels and cloths: perhaps 'toothed'
𐀳-𐀖-𐁃-𐀲 te-mi-dwe-ta wheel with teeth
